specializedIntro.title: SPECIALIZED SERVICES
specializedIntro.subtitle: Empower your business with secure, intelligent, and scalable Microsoft solutions — designed, deployed, and managed by CelesteIQ experts

training.title: Empower Your Team. Master Microsoft 365.
training.body: At CelesteIQ, we help your team become Microsoft experts. Our training programs teach how to configure, automate, and manage Microsoft 365 tools to boost productivity and collaboration.
training.item1: Duration: 4 days (28 hours) — 1 day per week over 4 weeks
training.item2: Format: 100% remote via Microsoft Teams (max. 6 participants)
training.item3: Outcome: Hands-on mastery + Certificate of Participation
training.item4: Access: Open to all Microsoft 365 users
training.whyBody: Train your employees to get the most out of Microsoft tools — from Teams to Power Automate — and drive digital transformation within your organization.
training.btnLong: Learn. Apply. Transform the way your team works.

docsMigration.title: Secure. Centralized. Future-Ready.
docsMigration.body: We make moving your documents to SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams simple and secure. No data loss, no downtime — just a smooth transition to a smarter cloud environment.
docsMigration.item1: Secure data transfer with full compliance
docsMigration.item2: Migration of files, folders, and permissions
docsMigration.whyBody: Modern businesses run on seamless collaboration. We make your move to Microsoft 365 effortless — so your teams can focus on what really matters.
docsMigration.btnLong: Migrate with confidence. Work smarter in the cloud.

emailMigration.title: Stay Connected. Stay Protected.
emailMigration.body: Upgrade your email system to Microsoft Exchange Online with zero disruption. We handle everything — setup, migration, DNS, and user training — so your communication never stops.
emailMigration.item3: Set up DNS, DKIM, DMARC, SPF & AutoDiscover
emailMigration.item5: Train your team on Outlook & best practices
emailMigration.whyBody: Email is the core of your business communication. We ensure it’s secure, reliable, and easy to manage.
emailMigration.btnLong: Simplify your email systems with CelesteIQ

managedIt.title: Your Trusted Microsoft Ecosystem Partner.
managedIt.body: From Microsoft 365 and Azure to Dynamics 365 and Power BI, we manage your IT ecosystem end-to-end. Our team ensures everything stays secure, optimized, and scalable — so you can grow without limits.
managedIt.item2: Microsoft 365, Azure, Dynamics 365 & Power BI management
managedIt.item4: Tailored support and training for your team
managedIt.whyBody: Managed IT means peace of mind. With CelesteIQ, your systems run smoothly, securely, and strategically aligned with your business goals.
managedIt.btnLong: Let us manage your cloud — so you can manage your growth.
